plants.name: Aningapara
plants.about: It is a tropical species that is fast growing and easy to handle.
plants.water_tips: Always keep the soil moist without getting wet. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Zamioculca
plants.about: Despite blooming in spring, it is beautiful and green all year round.
plants.water_tips: Use pots with holes and stones at the bottom to facilitate drainage. Water once a day.

plants.name: Peperomia
plants.about: Adapts both to sun and shade, but prefers to stay in a cool corner, without direct sun.
plants.water_tips: On warmer days, spray the leaves with water. Water 3 times a week.

plants.name: Imbé
plants.about: Medium-sized that adapts to different regions, in addition to being very easy to grow. It conquers more and more people.
plants.water_tips: Always keep the soil moist without getting wet. Water twice a week.

plants.name: Espada São Jorge
plants.about: The aroma reduces anxiety levels and its scent helps with sleep quality and daytime productivity.
plants.water_tips: Water the surrounding soil. Water once a day.

plants.name: Yucca
plants.about: They are recommended because they are easy to maintain and care for. You can put them in small vases, or even in cups.
plants.water_tips: Thanks to the water reserve of these greens, it is always better to water little. Water once a week.

plants.name: Frutíferas
plants.about: They require a few hours of sunlight a day, so close to windows.
plants.water_tips: Always water the soil and not the leaves. Water 3 times a week

plants.name: Orquídea
plants.about: It brings a feeling of tranquility and peace to the environment. Low maintenance and great for those with little space.
plants.water_tips: Water moderately. Apply 4 times a week.

plants.name: Violeta
plants.about: With delicate flowers. They are great suggestions for decorating the bathroom.
plants.water_tips: No watering the flowers and leaves. Water the soil twice a week.

plants.name: Hortênsia
plants.about: Hydrangea is a rustic plant and adapts to different types of soils.
plants.water_tips: Always keep the soil moist without getting wet. Water once a day.
